about:
I am passionate about my work as a developer and constantly driven by the opportunity to learn and grow. My enthusiasm for technology and problem-solving motivates me to dive deep into new challenges, always striving to deliver high-quality solutions.
 During my internship at A.P. Moller Maersk, I embraced every opportunity to refine my skills in Java and Spring Boot, contributing to significant performance improvements and team success.
 Beyond work, I enjoy playing cricket, listening to podcasts, and spending time on my family farm. 
Looking ahead, my goal is to build robust and scalable backend solutions that drive impactful user experiences while continuously expanding my expertise in cutting-edge technologies like cloud computing and distributed systems. I am excited about collaborating with like-minded professionals and contributing to projects that make a difference.
